description: This file is a shell script designed for uploading telemetry data to a server, with support for different connection methods (direct and Codebig proxy), error handling, resending failed uploads, and dynamic endpoint configuration. It manages the upload process triggered by system events or bootup, utilizing external scripts and property files.

methods.name: getTelemetryEndpoint
methods.description: Determines the telemetry server URL based on device configuration and RFC settings.

methods.name: pidCleanup
methods.description: Removes the PID file indicating an upload process is running.

methods.name: IsCodebigBlocked
methods.description: Checks if Codebig proxy is temporarily blocked based on last failure timestamp.

methods.name: get_Codebigconfig
methods.description: Configures whether to use Codebig proxy or direct connection based on system capabilities and policy.

methods.name: useDirectRequest
methods.description: Performs telemetry upload via direct HTTPS connection.

methods.name: useCodebigRequest
methods.description: Performs telemetry upload via Codebig proxy, with retries and fallback handling.
